DOC.brief_title: Taichi Overweight/Obese Adolescent Young Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.criteria: Women age 19 35 year ; Diagnosis PCOS accord modify Rotterdam criterion ; 2 year menarche ; Body mass index ( BMI ) equal great 23 kg/m*m. Administration medication know affect reproductive function metabolism within past three month , include oral contraceptive , Gonadotropinreleasing hormone ( GnRH ) agonists antagonist , anti androgen , gonadotropin , antiobesity drug , Chinese herbal medicine , anti diabetic drug metformin thiazolidinediones , somatostatin , diazoxide , calcium channel blocker . Patients endocrine disorder include 21hydroxylase deficiency , hyperprolactinemia , uncorrected thyroid disease , suspect Cushing 's syndrome . Patients know severe organ dysfunction mental illness .
